A grounbraeking medikal deviec desingned to detec catracts in nweborns is beeing enahnced with the hlpe of AI. The Neocom, a handeld digitl imgaing tool creted by Addenbrooe’s eye surgon, Dr Lousie Alen, allwos midwivse to take potos of a babby’s eeys to sopt cognetial catracts — the leding cause of preventibal childhod blindnes.
content after edit: Check and correct typos across all slides, then summarize changes. Please check slide 3 for any typos or errors, correct them, and provide a summary of the changes.

A groundbreaking medical device designed to detect cataracts in newborns is being enhanced with the help of AI. The Neocom, a handheld digital imaging tool created by Addenbrooke’s eye surgeon, Dr. Louise Allen, allows midwives to take photos of a baby’s eyes to spot congenital cataracts—the leading cause of preventable childhood blindness.
